text: Eto velikoye nakazaniye budet v tot Den', kogda posvetleyut litsa veruyushchikh ot radosti i pocherneyut litsa neveruyushchikh ot pechali. Tem, u kotorykh litsa pocherneyut, budet skazano s uprokom: "Neuzheli vy stali nevernymi posle togo, kak priobshchilis' k istine, chto svoystvenno chelovecheskoy prirode, i poshli po pryamomu puti, i k vam prishli yasnyye znameniya ob etoy istine? Tak vkusite zhe muku za to, chto vy ne verovali
